P

PersonGenerator - Class in randomdata
The purpose of this class is to generate random Person objects The person() method takes as argument the number of persons to be generated All persons generated will have unique phone numbers within a single call to persons(), but not between two calls to persons().
PersonGenerator() - Constructor for class randomdata.PersonGenerator
 
persons(int) - Static method in class randomdata.PersonGenerator
